mapper.update:
UPDATE tr_supplier
supplierName = #{supplierName},
province = #{province},
city = #{city},
businessNo = #{businessNo},
businessImage = #{businessImage},
cooperative = #{cooperative},
linkMan = #{linkMan},
linkPhone = #{linkPhone},
linkEmail = #{linkEmail},
status = #{status},
createTime = #{createTime},
auditTime = #{auditTime},
auditInfo = #{auditInfo},
remark = #{remark},
WHERE id = #{id}
